title: “Do not place a hand on Sinhala Buddhist Mandate” protest staged
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Maha Sangha and several social media activists are engaged in a march from the Nelum Pokuna Theater in Colombo today (12).
The march was held on the theme, “Do not be Deceived by False Struggles to Place a Hand on Sinhala Buddhist Mandate.”
The march was organized by the ‘Rata Wenuwen Api’ organization.
The group was gathered opposite the Buddha Statue at the Viharamahadevi Park a short while ago.
“Do not place a hand on Sinhala Buddhist Mandate” protest staged
Shantha Bandara takes oath as State Minister; SLFP calls it a betrayal of policies
